name: nOughts & croXes (SPECIAL ED.)
description:
nOughts and croXes - or originally called "Noughts and Crosses" or "Tic-Tac-Toe" is a strategy, tactics, observation game usually played with 2 players on a 3x3 board.

In this edition though, you can play with 1 player (vs AI) or 2 players on a board ranging from 3x3 - 5x5!

(This is a small project I try to make in 5 days to try to push my limit, so this game might sucks, if you find any bugs, plz tell me!!) :))    Thanks for coming!!

 - Best wishes,   DQG <3
